org.patneu.simpleflash

Class SimpleFlash.NotifyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.patneu.simpleflash.SimpleFlash.NotifyManager
  • Enclosing class:
    SimpleFlash

    protected class SimpleFlash.NotifyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class that handles all kinds of notifications shown to the user.

    Since:
    Version 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • sendNotification

        protected void sendNotification(int id,
                    android.app.Notification notification)
        Sends a status bar Notification for the user.

        This method is primarily used to send a CameraOnNotification with the CAMERA_ON_ID. If you want to send another Notification, you should make sure that it doesn't use the same id, since this could result in unpredictable behavior.
        Parameters:
        id - an id to identify the Notification to send
        notification - the Notification to send
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        cancelNotification(int)

      • cancelNotification

        protected void cancelNotification(int id)
        Cancels a status bar Notification.

        Parameters:
        id - an id to identify the Notification to cancel
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        sendNotification(int, android.app.Notification)

      • sendToast

        protected void sendToast(java.lang.String text,
             int duration)
        Sends a Toast for the user.

        Parameters:
        text - the message to show
        duration - the duration to show the text, should be Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        sendToast(int, int)

      • sendToast

        protected void sendToast(int textId,
             int duration)
        Sends a Toast for the user.

        Parameters:
        textId - the id of a String resource to show as the message
        duration - the duration to show the text, should be Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        sendToast(java.lang.String, int)
